name: HELP! I'M STUCK IN THE MIDDLE [Special Edition Full-Colour Electronic Download Version]
description:
The 10 Powerful Questions You Must Answer to Break Through Your Glass Ceiling

For Women Who Feel Stuck or Held Back in their Careers

Feeling stuck or held back in your career?

* Think it’s all ‘their fault’? * Think it’s out of your control? * Think you have to put up with it? … THINK AGAIN!!!

This book is for you if you’ve ever felt like this at work:

 * You’re working hard without making any progress in your career! * You're stuck in your current role and don’t know how to make the next move! * You’re demotivated and frustrated! * You don’t have the confidence to ask for what you want! * Your male colleagues always seem to get the great jobs! * Your organisation or your manager doesn’t recognise your talent! * You’re uncertain about your career path! * You’ve hit a ‘glass ceiling’ and something or someone is blocking your advancement! You’ll discover the 10 MOST POWERFUL AND EMPOWERING QUESTIONS you can ask yourself when you reach this point. These questions will trigger your awareness, insight, creativity and ideas on how you can take control of your career and get to that next level. Filled with worksheets that prompt you to ‘self-examine’ your current situation, finding answers and solutions that may have eluded you before. You’ll find a way to create a powerful ACTION PLAN that you can implement to see immediate results. Written by Helga Skriker, founder of Woman of Worth™, who is passionate about empowering women to achieve personal happiness and career success through her ‘Personal Power’ and ‘Self-Mastery’ Programmes. © Helga Skriker 2012 www.wowselfmastery.com www.womanofworth.com
